LIBRA - Machine Translation between paired
Single-Cell Multi-Omics Data 
===========

# Summary
LIBRA is a scalable toolkit for AI-Single-Cell data integration and prediction. It includes loading, clustering and visualization for either tasks. The Python-based implementation efficiently deals with big datasets as well as reduce the time requirements for multiple grid-base model trainings using parallelization.

Discuss usage on the [Github](https://github.com/TranslationalBioinformaticsUnit/LIBRA). Read the [documentation](https://sc-libra.readthedocs.io/en/latest/).

For further details, please refer to the [online manuscript](https://www.biorxiv.org/content/10.1101/2021.01.27.428400v2) currently at biorxiv repository (will be updated asap). If LIBRA is useful for your research, consider citing us.
